item.description: 1.63.0 (Unreleased) # Remove migrate borrowck mode Stabilize the bundle native library modifier Stabilize $$ in Rust 1.63.0 Make write/print macros eagerly drop temporaries Stabilize Ipv6Addr::to_ipv4_mapped Stabilize const_intrinsic_copy Stabilize {slice,array}::from_ref Stabilize checked slice->str conversion functions Stabilize box_into_pin Stabilize toowned_clone_into Stabilize Path::try_exists() and improve doc Stabilize scoped threads. Revert “Stabilize $$ in Rust 1.63.0”

1.64.0 (Unreleased) # Implement network primitives with ideal Rust layout, not C system layout Stabilize let_chains in Rust 1.64 Utilize PGO for windows x64 rustc dist builds Implement fmt::Write for OsString allow unions with mutable references and tuples of allowed types Stabilize core::ffi:c_* and rexport in std::ffi Remove restrictions on compare-exchange memory ordering. Stabilize Windows FileTypeExt with is_symlink_dir and is_symlink_file Let rust-analyzer ship on stable, non-preview Stabilize into_future Document and stabilize process_set_process_group Keep unstable target features for asm feature checking Upgrade indexmap and thorin-dwp to use hashbrown 0.
